    CREATE TABLE `status` (
    `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
    `image` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    `status` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
    `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
    ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
